CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Contact.Intake_Location__c, 'EOC Brockton') && ISPICKVAL(Campaign.Service_Year__c , '2017-2018') && Active__c = True && ISPICKVAL( Financial_Aid_App_Completion__c , 'Complete Other Fin Aid App (EOC)') && ( ISPICKVAL( Grade_Level_at_Start_Non_Adult__c, 'Grade 12 (Senior)') || ISPICKVAL( Grade_Level_at_Start_Non_Adult__c, 'Secondary School dropout') || ISPICKVAL( Educational_Status_at_Start_Adult__c, 'A1_Adult w/o Cred Alternative Ed') || ISPICKVAL( Educational_Status_at_Start_Adult__c, 'A3_HS/GED Grad NOT in postsec') || ISPICKVAL( Educational_Status_at_Start_Adult__c, 'A4_Adult w/Cred postsec dropout') || ISPICKVAL( Educational_Status_at_Start_Adult__c, 'A6_Potential postsec transfer') ), 'Goal # achieved' , 'Goal # not achieved' )
CustomField.label: DB - EOC Brockton - 4 DELETE
